posts.post_content:
A few C46 Imperial Tobacco cards for sale (photos/links below). Prices are firm.  I accept Check, MO, or Paypal (no fees). Please add $2 Shipping for a single card or free shipping for multiple card purchases. 

8 Billy Nattress (Montreal)              $SOLD
26 John Ganzel (Rochester)            $25
34 Bill Collins (Newark) PSA 2         $SOLD
78 Jack Hardy (Montreal) PSA 3.5   $40
80 William Baxter (Buffalo)             $SOLD
